messages.body:
Hi,

I would like to request a refund for my recent purchase of the Photography Basics course. I bought it yesterday but realized it's not quite what I was looking for - the content is more advanced than I expected.

I haven't downloaded any of the course materials yet. Here are my order details:
• Order number: ORD-2024-0214-789
• Purchase date: February 14, 2024
• Amount: $49.99

I understand your refund policy and hope you can help me with this request.

Thank you for your assistance.
